Package de.weltraumschaf.commons.system

Abstractions for system things.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BrowserLauncher.Executor
    Abstracts process execution.
    Exitable
    An exitable gives the interface to exit an program w/o calling System.exit(int) directly.
    ExitCode
    Defines an exit code.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BrowserLauncher
    This class opens default browser for DemoLauncher class.
    BrowserLauncher.DefaultExecutor
    Default implementation which delegates to Runtime.
    DefaultExiter
    Invokes System.exit(int).
    ExitableAdapter
    Common shared functionality for exiters.
    NullExiter
    Does nothing instead of calling System.exit(int).
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    BrowserLauncher.CliCommands
    Collects browser open commands for the CLI of various operating systems and browsers.
    OperatingSystem
    Defines and determines the operating system the JVM runs on.

Package de.weltraumschaf.commons.system Description

Abstractions for system things.

This package is a part of the open-source Commons
